description: From a phonetic spelling of chamois, a word borrowed from French.

examples: I afterwards adopted the precaution of using very thin shamoy gloves, and have often taken observations at still lower temperatures without injury.

verbs.description: shamoy (third-person singular simple present shamoys, present participle shamoying, simple past and past participle shamoyed)

entries.meaning: To prepare leather by working oil into the skin.
